about.title: About Me
about.description: I'm Zakaria Oumghar, a dedicated software engineering student with a passion for building impactful applications. I enjoy tackling complex problems and turning ideas into reality through code. My journey in tech has equipped me with a diverse skill set and a growth mindset that drives me to continuously learn and improve.

educationList.university: Imam Malik Technical High School, Berrechid

achievements: Developed a complete digital solution (GAP) for purchase tracking and personnel management
Designed and implemented a full-stack web application using React.js, Tailwind CSS, Node.js, and MySQL
Collaborated with stakeholders to identify needs and deliver a user-friendly interface
